column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////It seems people run hot and cold on Ba Ba Reeba. Last night was my first time there
column2: and I was cautiously optimistic. I was with a large group
column3: and our table was ready promptly after we arrived. The atmosphere is quite nice
column4: and though it's a little noisy
column5: there are quite a few nooks and crannies that offer a feeling of intimacy.
